channel.title: Item slots
channel.description: Ummmm... i have a little problem about item slots.. problem is that if i wear skillcape it goes to weapon slot and i cant wield weapon with it and hoods go to amulet slots so can anybody help me =(

item.title: Item slots
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:170098”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=229938.msg1970704#msg1970704 date=1199291536]
Go into item.java, and find:

public static int capes[]

Now add the Skillcape ID at the very end of that code at the end.

Save & Compile, now it should go in Capes slot.
[/quote]
Don’t forget to remove it from the amulets array.[/quote]

Oops, I didn’t read his first post, I thought he said Weapon area, Thanks for pointing that out Yz85

Read full topic

item.title: Item slots
item.dc:creator: @ZZZpk ZZZpk
item.description:
@ZZZpk wrote:

Ty both guys you helped me fast =)
